name: DeepCore Inc. [Prototype]
description:
Your ship crashes while leaving an asteroid your company has sent you to mine. Without the memory of why your ship crashed, you set out to find the parts you need to fix your ship and escape.

Currently a very VERY early build that is lacking most features, and is a glorified tech demo. But in the long run we want to flesh this out to include all of our planned ideas. If interested keep up with us on here, because we will be working on it a lot more!

Created by : Kealmcking, Sakiskid, WinslowMagne, Birdjohn1
